title: Vanguard's Head of Fixed Income Head on Treasury Turmoil
description: Sara Devereux, Vanguard Global Head of Fixed Income, says the term premium is a key focus for the administration, with affordability top of mind. She tells Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close” that mortgage rates and Treasury supply-demand dynamics remain central issues. (Source: Bloomberg)
